newsitem.title: UK: AVX in 45.7 mln stg N.Ireland expansion.
newsitem.headline: AVX in 45.7 mln stg N.Ireland expansion.

text.p: U.S.-based electronic component supplier AVX Corp is investing 45.7 million stg in an expansion of its ceramic chip operation in Coleraine, Northern Ireland, the province's Industrial Development Board said on Tuesday.

"The investment of a group of AVX's international standing is a massive endorsement of Northern Ireland as a base for the development and manufacture of advanced and miniaturised electronic components," IDB Chairman John McGuckian said in a statement.
The AVX operation, which has been in Coleraine for 18 years, currently employs 950 people who manufacture multi-layer ceramic capacitors.
AVX general manager Martin McGuigan said the investment would help strengthen the Coleraine operation's position as one of the most cost-efficient manufacturers in the AVX's worldwide operations.
The IDB said it had offered the expansion project eight million stg in selective financial assistance.
